abstract: When HSBC reports its 2008 results on Monday, it could offer a glimpse into the future of the economic downturn in Asia, The Wall Street Journal says.
lead_paragraph: When HSBC reports its 2008 results on Monday, it could offer a glimpse into the future of the economic downturn in Asia, The Wall Street Journal says.

headline.main: HSBC: A Harbinger of Things to Come in Asia?
